description:
Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is the next-generation multi-format document-processing component suite for .NET developers. Currently, it supports viewing, printing, and converting PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. XtremeDocumentStudio also includes AJAX-powered ASP.NET WebForms and MVC document viewer extension and a WPF document viewer component. Document creation and editing components have also been introduced in a preview (beta) basis. Intelligent conversion of PDF to DOCX has also been included.

XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is 100% managed code. It can natively process supported formats without requiring external software such as Microsoft Word, Open XML SDK, Word Automation Services, Adobe PDF library or GhostScript.

FREE Edition: This special edition of XtremeDocumentStudio contains only the WinForms document viewer component. Currently, it supports viewing DOCX, DOC, PDF, and image (BMP, JPEG, PNG, TIFF,...) formats. The Free Edition can be used in commercial applications, subject to all the terms and conditions of the XtremeDocumentStudio .NET 

Free Edition SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT AND LIMITED WARRANTY document available at:
    http://www.gnostice.com/XtremeDocumentStudio_dot_NET.asp?show=license
The license key to activate the Free Edition can be obtained by registering at:
    http://www.gnostice.com/XtremeDocumentStudio_dot_NET.asp?show=downloads#free_reg
releaseNotes:
Version 2014 R8 - December 12, 2014
========================
* XtremeDocumentStudio Free edition
  - Includes the multi-format WinForms document viewer component with full functionality of the current version. 
    + Supported formats: 
      - Documents - PDF, DOCX, DOC
      - Images - BMP, PNG, JPEG, WMF, EMF, and (single-page and multi-page) TIFF
    + Load from files
    + Load from streams
    + Navigate pages using toolbar, scroll bars, mouse, keyboard
    + Select to zoom
    + Rotate individual or all pages
    + PDF
        - Fonts - Type 1, Type 2 or CFF, TrueType
        - Images - BMP, JPEG, CCITTFax, JBIG2
        - Text, shapes, images, form fields (static only)
    + DOCX
        - Image Positioning - absolute, wrapping, alignment, relative
        - Images - GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF
        - Layout - Print
        - Rendered elements - Sections, pages, paragraphs, columns, lists, images
        - Richly formatted paragraphs - font styles, alignment, indentation, tab stops
        - Text formatting - font, size, weight, style, superscript, subscript
        - Lists - numbered, bulleted, nested
        - Tables (styles hierarchy, table/cell borders (Left, Top, Right, Bottom, InsideH, InsideV), table/cell shading (color and solid-pattern filling), cell margins, cell alignment, split cells, merged cells (horizontal and vertical)), tables spread across multiple pages, repeating table headers on several pages
    + DOC
        - Layout - Print
        - Richly formatted paragraphs - font styles, alignment, indentation, tab stops
        - Text formatting - font, size, weight, style, superscript, subscript
        - Lists - numbered, bulleted, nested
        - Tables (styles hierarchy, table/cell borders (Left, Top, Right, Bottom, InsideH, InsideV), table/cell shading (color and solid-pattern filling), cell margins, cell alignment, split cells, merged cells (horizontal and vertical)), tables spread across multiple pages, repeating table headers on several pages.
summary: View, print and convert PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. Provides ASP .NET viewer, WinForms viewer, MVC viewer and WPF viewer components.
title: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET Free
